hero.title: THEY CAN
hero.subtitle: Collective of cis and trans women working to defend rights and public policies. We promote equity, freedom, sisterhood, and respect for human dignity.

mission.title: They Can Love, They Can Be, They Can DO EVERYTHING!
mission.text1: We are a collective founded in 2020 in Campo Grande - MS, operating nationwide through digital networks. We defend the rights of cis and trans women, promoting their political and social participation.
mission.text2: Our core values are: Equity, Freedom, Sisterhood, and Respect for Human Dignity. We actively participate in state and national conferences, earning recognition as the Motion of Applause at the 5th State Conference on Public Policies for Women.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: Content production and political awareness campaigns about women's rights and public policies.

education.title: Education
education.description: Conversation circles and formative actions like Purple August, promoting political and social awareness.

social.title: Social Action
social.description: Community mobilization and support for diversity causes, strengthening networks of sisterhood.

political.title: Political Participation
political.description: Advocacy and defense of public policies in state and national women's conferences.

testimonial.quote: Transforming the future starts now. From each girl who discovers her voice to every woman who takes a position of power, we are changing stories and building a fairer country.

supporters.title: Who Supports Our Cause
supporters.subtitle: With the support of those who believe in transformation, we continue training girls and women to lead the future.

contact.title: Let's Talk?
contact.description: Have questions, suggestions, or want to learn more about our work? Contact us!

cta.title: Together We Are Stronger
cta.subtitle: Your contribution can change a woman's life and transform an entire community. Be part of this transformation!
